item.title: Boulevardier
item.description: Ingredients 1 - 1.25 part Rye Whiskey (Bourbon for sweeter) 1 part Campari 1 part Sweet Vermouth Directions Combine over ice Stir Serve in chilled glass Garnish with orange peel

item.title: Negroni (Negroski)
item.description: Ingredients 1 part Gin (or Vodka) 1 part Campari 1 part Sweet Vermouth Directions Combine over ice Stir Serve in chilled glass Garnish with orange peel

item.title: Pat O'Brien's Hurricane
item.description: Ingredients 1oz vodka 1/4oz grenadine 1oz gin 1oz light rum 1/2oz 151 rum 1oz amaretto 1oz triple sec Grapefruit juice Pineapple juice

item.title: Wine
item.description: Description Grandpa Bellino’s wine; Rosa’s handwritten notes Directions 10 cases muscat 2 cases zinfandel crush place in press strain in barrel leave 5" from top Continue filling with about 1 gal. After it boils (1 month) Cork it (40 days later) After 3-6 months place in bottles
